title: Rest & Sleep
subTitle: Be Relaxed
shortDescription: Be Relaxed. Unravel stress and tension from the body and mind and create your own nourishing rest practice with Jo Buick. Perfect if you're feeling frazzled or having trouble sleeping or unwinding at night.

description.heading: Connect with professionals
description.detail: Feeling rested isn’t just about sleep. That’s why we’ve partnered with Jo Buick to zoom out and help you to create a wholistic rest practice.

description.heading: Exclusive access to discounts on partner products:
description.detail: Need a little something more to get you over the line? If you finish the Rest and Sleep course you'll unlock exclusive discounts on brand partners such as Therapy Blanket, Inner Atlas and Nimbus Co.

description.heading: Upgrade to Expert Access for one on one help:
description.detail: For an extra $59, you can upgrade to Expert Access. This allows to you message with our Rest and Sleep course experts privately for 3 months, gain access to our exclusive webinars and you'll even receive a welcome gift with some items to get you started.

pricing.pricingShortDescription:
Curated to help you unwind your mind and get more rest.

Access lasts 3 months from purchase.
pricing.pricingDescription: It's time to unravel stress and tension from the body and mind and create your own nourishing rest practice. Our signature course brings together experts to deliver engaging and informative video learning with exclusive discounts from partner brands to reward you for finishing. What's not to love?

coursePackageDetail.title: 12 on demand lessons
coursePackageDetail.description: All of our course content is available on demand in our app or website. You can complete your learning for up to three months after purchasing the course.

coursePackageDetail.title: Downloadable course guide
coursePackageDetail.description: Want to take it away and think about it? Some of our modules also come with their own materials that you can download and print to think over or complete away from the screen.

coursePackageDetail.title: Specials offers throughout the course from Inner Atlas, Therapy Blanket and Nimbus
coursePackageDetail.description: Need a little more to get you motivated? Our rest course includes exclusive discounts with amazing partner brands that are unlocked after you complete the course.

expertAccessPackageDetail.title: Message one on one with your course expert, Jo Buick, and her team of rest experts for 3 months.
expertAccessPackageDetail.description: Get answers to all those niggling questions about your course by messaging one on one with our course experts and they’ll get back to you within 24 hours, who will help to guide you as you practice your course in everyday life for up to three months from purchase.

quote.title: Jo’s voice is a dream
quote.quote: “Jo’s voice is a dream and her presence alone is relaxing. The course book and workbook is easy to read and follow along. This course is a gift to yourself. Best investment I have made this year in me.”
quote.author: Tremaine

aboutCourse:
We all know the value of a good night's sleep, but rest expert Jo Buick teaches us that the power of simply slowing down should not be overlooked. In this six part course, Jo teaches you a radical theory of rest, how to set an intention to slow down your life and arms you with practices to embed rest into your routine.

You’ll learn:

  • How to unravel stress and cultivate more rest
  • Practices to help relax your busy mind and body
  • To work with your sleep cycle and hormones to help get your sleep back on track

rewardsDto.title: Save 10% online on the Rest & Restore Range at Endota Spa
rewardsDto.text:
Our lives are becoming increasingly hectic. We are sleeping less, working more and retiring later.

From uplifting essential oil roll-ons to soothing muscle baths and balms, endota are proud to bring you a range of products made with natural ingredients, carefully created to encourage you to completely relax and refresh.

To claim this offer, you must first unlock the reward via the Rest and Sleep signature course. Then spend online at endota Spa and enter the code provided by Benefit Pocket at checkout. Offer is only valid for purchases on full-priced products included in the Restore and Restore Range. Not cash redeemable. The offer will not be valid forever.  The discount does not apply to shipping / postage and cannot be used with other endota Spa offers.

rewardsDto.title: Save 30% off your first annual subscription with Nimbus Wellness when you purchase online
rewardsDto.text:
Nimbus Wellness ~ where your health journey begins.

A digital space dedicated to sculpting a healthier you. We offer a collection of thoughtfully designed topics that educates, enlightens and offers you a sensory experience in your health and wellness journey. Supported by health experts from all around the world.

Its varying content pillars encourages deeper learning from topics you know, and those you might not yet know in order to make health advice more accessible. No matter where you are or what your health story is, we want to be the first step for you to embark on this journey to a better life.

To claim this offer, you must first unlock the reward via the Rest and Sleep signature course. Then purchase an annual subscription online with Nimbus Wellness and enter the code provided by Benefit Pocket at checkout. Offer valid until 15th July 2022. Not cash redeemable. The offer is only available to customers who are signing up to a Nimbus Wellness subscription for the first time. Please note that the free trial period is not applicable to this purchase, and that the discount will only be applied for the first 12 months of your subscription. Nimbus Wellness Terms and Conditions apply [https://www.nimbusonline.com.au/sign-up], and you will be required to complete all membership documentation before you can access the membership. Benefit Pocket does not endorse any health advice provided by Nimbus Wellness. The offer cannot be used with any other offers.
